pl.polsl.report2

Class Report3SesionBean

  • java.lang.Object
    • pl.polsl.report2.Report3SesionBean
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Report3SesionBeanLocal

    public class Report3SesionBean
extends java.lang.Object
implements Report3SesionBeanLocal
    This class has Create, Retrieve, Update and the Delete methods that handles operations in the database for Airplane and Customer objects.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Kizmaz Zahid - Hernandez Raul
